event.event-info: This is a Club Event which is coordinated by pyramid club.

event-rules.name: Event Rules
event-rules.item: In round -1 there is Quiz competition which is performed individually.
In round-2 there is Group activity and it is Performed in a group.
Each group consist of maximum three members.

round.name: Round 2
round.item: Find the different components as mention above by following our code given at the time of event. (Group activity and each group consist of maximum three members).(15-02-2017)

teachers.name: Faculty In-charge:
Tapan Kumar Nayak (Asst. Prof Civil Engineering Dept.)

event-rules.name: Event Rules
event-rules.item: It consist of only one round which is of four hours.
This event is performed in a group and each group consists of maximum three members.
There is a provision of paper, gum, cutter and a stick.
After completion of this event there is a testing round of the structures which is made by paper but this activity will be perform in the next day.

round.name: Round 2
round.item: Testing of the structure by weight balance(16-02-2017)

teachers.name: Faculty In-charge:
Tapan Kumar Nayak (Asst. Prof Civil Engineering Dept.)

event-rules.name: Event Rules
event-rules.item: It consist of it consists of three rounds,which is conducted in three different days.
The 1st round is basically a fun quiz round so participant will perform individually.
In 2nd round is Treasure hunt round and it is a group activity.
The 3rd round is a balloon grab round in which you grab the balloons. After that activity winners will be decided.

teachers.name: Faculty In-charge:
Kajal Panigrahi (Asst. Prof Civil Engineering Dept.)

event-rules.name: Event Rules
event-rules.item: It consist of it consists of three rounds,which is conducted in single day.
The 1st round is basically a sack race and put brinjal in the bucket round so participant will perform individually.
In 2nd round is mazeobstacle round and it is individual group activity.
The 3rd round is a lock and key round in which you have to find the keys and solve the puzzle. After that activity winners will be decided.

event-rules.name: Event Rules
event-rules.item: It consist of only one round which is of two hours.
This event is performed in a group and each group consists of maximum three members.
There is a provision of paper, gum, cutter and stick.
After completion of this event the structures which is made by stick will be shown to the lecturer and then we will announce the winner

round.name: Round 2
round.item: Design will be decided according to the results and designs are actioned by us.(16-02-2017)

teachers.name: Faculty In-charge:
Tapan Kumar Nayak (Asst. Prof Civil Engineering Dept.)
